tasks.label: C/C++: gcc.exe build active file
args: ${fileDirname}\${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe -fmax-errors=2 -l opencv_calib3d2410.dll -l opencv_contrib2410.dll -l opencv_core2410.dll -l opencv_features2d2410.dll -l opencv_flann2410.dll -l opencv_gpu2410.dll -l opencv_highgui2410.dll -l opencv_imgproc2410.dll -l opencv_legacy2410.dll -l opencv_ml2410.dll -l opencv_nonfree2410.dll -l opencv_objdetect2410.dll -l opencv_ocl2410.dll -l opencv_photo2410.dll -l opencv_stitching2410.dll -l opencv_superres2410.dll -l opencv_video2410.dll -l opencv_videostab2410.dll -L C:\tools\msys64\mingw64\lib -I C:\tools\msys64\include -l cekeikon41 -L ws2_32 -L C:\tools\msys64\cekeikon\bin -L C:\tools\msys64\cekeikon\projs\bin -I C:\tools\msys64\cekeikon\src -O3 -s
